channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Critical SharePoint Exploits Exposed: MDVM Response and Protection Strategy
item.description:
Overview MDVM is aware of active attacks targeting on-premises SharePoint Server customers:
CVE
Type
CVSS v3.1
Patch status
CVE‑2025‑49704
Improper control of code‑generation → authenticated RCE
8.8 (High)
Fixed in the 8 July 2025 security updates — Subscription Edition KB 5002768, SharePoint Server 2019 KB 5002741, SharePoint Server 2016 KB 5002744. Microsoft Support
CVE‑2025‑49706
Improper authentication / spoofing
6.3 (Medium)
Fixed in the same 8 July 2025 updates (KB 5002768 / 5002741 / 5002744). Microsoft Support
CVE‑2025‑53770
Deserialization of untrusted data → un...
